title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models in 3 lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client (Node & browser) for Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama (PyPI)
summary: LangChain adapter giving Ollama chat, embed, tool-calling nodes.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; folders, RAG, voice.

title: continue
summary: VS Code & JetBrains plugin that uses local Ollama models for inline autocomplete & chat.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG pipeline combining Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with documents.

title: chainlit-ollama
summary: Chainlit integration – build shareable Ollama chat apps in minutes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-mode proxy that routes completions through a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI with model search, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Spring Boot starters included.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama generators & embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All UI branch that adds Ollama backend support for model management.

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency Node.js client wrapping Ollama REST endpoints.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client + ASP.NET Core middleware for hosting Ollama chats.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust client using reqwest; supports streaming chat & embeddings.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings Ollama models to your server with slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger CI module to cache and test Ollama models inside your pipelines.

title: r/ollama - Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for model announcements, troubleshooting and ecosystem showcases.
